page.title: 12Bright Steels
page.content:
Bright Steels - a firm that prides itself on a human approach to industry.
{From the beginning, 60 years ago, {Bright Steels Ltd of Norton on Derwent {have developed into the largest {producers of bright drawn flat bars {in Europe.
While achieving this position by steady expansion over the years, the company has remained very much a family concern and continues to place a special value on a human approach to industry and those engaged in it.
The company acts as a processor, not producer, drawing steel supplied from rolling mills and fashioning it into more accurate and useable forms for a wide variety of industries.
